availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alex H. Major (Franklin County, Frankfort, Kentucky, teacher )

body.p: Frankfort, Franklin County, Kentucky, teacher. Kentucky native. Son of Samuel J. M. Major and Martha N. Major. Married Annie K. Mclain in Henderson County, Kentucky on February 25, 1863. Father of Lulie Major in 1865. Resident in Franklin County, Kentucky in 1850. Teacher in Franklin County, Frankfort, Kentucky in 1860. Enrolled for military duty in Second District of Kentucky on July 1, 1863 (U.S.A).

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 143.Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 241.Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Upper Town Precinct, p. 235.Kentucky Marriage Records, Henderson County, Kentucky, Henderson County Marriages, Film #001944390, p.92.Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Henderson County, KY, July 1863, p. 254, (Accessed via ancestry.com). Find A Grave, "Alex H. Major (1837-November 16, 1878)," Memorial #85736619 https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/85736619 (accessed April 14, 2019). Edmund L. Starling, History of Henderson County, Kentucky (Henderson, Kentucky, 1887), 813 (accessed via google books).
